text: Martin Herzberg (1911-1972) was a German film actor. As a child actor he appeared in over thirty films during the silent and early sound eras. Herzberg was of Jewish heritage.Prawer p.213 He retired from films in 1930 at the age of nineteen and later settled in the Canary Islands. ==Selected filmography== * David Copperfield (1922) * Paganini (1923) * The Hungarian Princess (1923) * Comedians of Life (1924) * Carlos and Elisabeth (1924) * A Free People (1925) * Students' Love (1927) * Mary Stuart (1927) * Band of Thieves (1928) * The Age of Seventeen (1929) * The Youths (1929) * Misled Youth (1929) * Youthful Indiscretion (1929) * The Last Company (1930) * Father and Son (1930) == References == == Bibliography == * Prawer, S.S.
